1: -module(eep48_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
    6: 
    7: %% Test server callbacks
    8: -export([suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
    9: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   10: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   11: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   12: 
   13: %% Test cases
   14: -export([edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation/1,
   15: 	 module_anno/1,
   16: 	 function_anno/1,
   17: 	 type_anno/1,
   18: 	 cb_anno/1,
   19: 	 function_since_tag/1,
   20: 	 function_deprecated_tag/1,
   21: 	 type_since_tag/1,
   22: 	 type_deprecated_tag/1,
   23: 	 cb_since_tag/1,
   24: 	 cb_deprecated_tag/1,
   25: 	 links/1,
   26: 	 see_tags_grouped_together/1,
   27: 	 equiv/1,
   28: 	 f_sig_single_simple_clause/1,
   29: 	 f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec/1,
   30: 	 f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses/1,
   31: 	 f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec/1,
   32: 	 f_sig_single_record_clause/1,
   33: 	 f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec/1,
   34: 	 f_sig_multiple_record_clauses/1,
   35: 	 f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec/1,
   36: 	 f_spec_type_without_name/1,
   37: 	 f_spec_types_mixed/1,
   38: 	 f_spec_with_multiple_clauses/1,
   39: 	 f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause/1,
   40: 	 f_spec_lhs_match_expr/1,
   41: 	 f_spec_rhs_match_expr/1,
   42: 	 f_spec_unnamed_pattern/1,
   43: 	 f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun/1,
   44: 	 f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun/1,
   45: 	 f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom/1,
   46: 	 f_spec_bounded_singleton_int/1,
   47: 	 f_spec_rettype_constraint/1,
   48: 	 f_spec_indirect_constraint/1,
   49: 	 f_spec_arg_type_in_retval/1,
   50: 	 f_redundant_spec/1,
   51: 	 f_only_attr/1,
   52: 	 f_only_tag/1,
   53: 	 f_prefixed_spec/1,
   54: 	 t_only_attr/1,
   55: 	 t_only_tag/1,
   56: 	 t_redundant/1]).
   57: 
   58: -define(a2b(A), atom_to_binary(A, utf8)).
   59: -define(io2b(IO), iolist_to_binary(IO)).
   60: 
   61: %%
   62: %% CT preamble
   63: %%
   64: 
   65: suite() -> [].
   66: 
   67: all() -> [edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation,
   68: 	  module_anno,
   69: 	  function_anno,
   70: 	  type_anno,
   71: 	  cb_anno,
   72: 	  function_since_tag,
   73: 	  function_deprecated_tag,
   74: 	  type_since_tag,
   75: 	  type_deprecated_tag,
   76: 	  cb_since_tag,
   77: 	  cb_deprecated_tag,
   78: 	  links,
   79: 	  see_tags_grouped_together,
   80: 	  equiv,
   81: 	  f_sig_single_simple_clause,
   82: 	  f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec,
   83: 	  f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses,
   84: 	  f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec,
   85: 	  f_sig_single_record_clause,
   86: 	  f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec,
   87: 	  f_sig_multiple_record_clauses,
   88: 	  f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec,
   89: 	  f_spec_type_without_name,
   90: 	  f_spec_types_mixed,
   91: 	  f_spec_with_multiple_clauses,
   92: 	  f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause,
   93: 	  f_spec_lhs_match_expr,
   94: 	  f_spec_rhs_match_expr,
   95: 	  f_spec_unnamed_pattern,
   96: 	  f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun,
   97: 	  f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun,
   98: 	  f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom,
   99: 	  f_spec_bounded_singleton_int,
  100: 	  f_spec_rettype_constraint,
  101: 	  f_spec_indirect_constraint,
  102: 	  f_spec_arg_type_in_retval,
  103: 	  f_redundant_spec,
  104: 	  f_only_attr,
  105: 	  f_only_tag,
  106: 	  f_prefixed_spec,
  107: 	  t_only_attr,
  108: 	  t_only_tag,
  109: 	  t_redundant].
  110: 
  111: %% TODO: remove these cases once EDoc supports extracting the relevant tags
  112: not_supported() -> [type_since_tag,
  113: 		    type_deprecated_tag,
  114: 		    cb_since_tag,
  115: 		    cb_deprecated_tag].
  116: 
  117: groups() -> [].
  118: 
  119: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config.
  120: end_per_suite(_Config) -> ok.
  121: 
  122: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) -> Config.
  123: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) -> ok.
  124: 
  125: init_per_testcase(edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation = _CaseName, Config) ->
  126:     case test_server:is_cover() of
  127:         true ->
  128:             {skip,"Test fails when cover compiled"};
  129:         false ->
  130:             {ok, #{ebin := EbinDir} = CopyInfo} =
  131:                 copy_application(edoc, ?config(priv_dir, Config)),
  132:             true = code:add_patha(EbinDir),
  133:             [{edoc_copy, CopyInfo} | Config]
  134:     end;
  135: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  136:     case lists:member(CaseName, not_supported()) of
  137: 	true ->
  138: 	    {skip, "not supported"};
  139: 	false ->
  140: 	    Config
  141:     end.
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation = _CaseName, Config) ->
  144:     #{ebin := EbinDir} = ?config(edoc_copy, Config),
  145:     true = code:del_path(EbinDir),
  146:     Config;
  147: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) -> Config.
  148: 
  149: %%
  150: %% Tests
  151: %%
  152: 
  153: edoc_app_should_pass_shell_docs_validation(_Config) ->
  154:     ok = edoc:application(edoc, [{preprocess,true},
  155:                                  {doclet, edoc_doclet_chunks},
  156: 				 {layout, edoc_layout_chunks},
  157: 				 private, hidden]),
  158:     ok = application:load(edoc),
  159:     {ok, Modules} = application:get_key(edoc, modules),
  160:     [ shell_docs:validate(M) || M <- Modules ].
  161: 
  162: module_anno(Config) ->
  163:     Docs = #docs_v1{} = get_chunk(Config, eep48_meta),
  164:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  165:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 1}],
  166: 		 Docs#docs_v1.anno).
  167: 
  168: function_anno(Config) ->
  169:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  170:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  171:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 35}],
  172: 		 get_anno(function, fun_with_since_tag, 0, Docs)).
  173: 
  174: type_anno(Config) ->
  175:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  176:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  177:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 22}],
  178: 		 get_anno(type, type_with_since_tag, 0, Docs)).
  179: 
  180: cb_anno(Config) ->
  181:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  182:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  183:     ?assertEqual([{file, "eep48_meta.erl"}, {location, 28}],
  184: 		 get_anno(callback, cb_with_since_tag, 0, Docs)).
  185: 
  186: function_since_tag(Config) ->
  187:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  188:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  189:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.1.0">>, get_function_meta_field(since, fun_with_since_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  190: 
  191: function_deprecated_tag(Config) ->
  192:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  193:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  194:     ?assertEqual(<<"Deprecated function.">>,
  195: 		 get_function_meta_field(deprecated, fun_with_deprecated_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  196: 
  197: type_since_tag(Config) ->
  198:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  199:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  200:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.1.0">>, get_type_meta_field(since, type_with_since_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  201: 
  202: type_deprecated_tag(Config) ->
  203:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  204:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  205:     ?assertEqual(<<"Deprecated type.">>,
  206: 		 get_type_meta_field(deprecated, type_with_deprecated_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  207: 
  208: cb_since_tag(Config) ->
  209:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  210:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  211:     ?assertEqual(<<"0.1.0">>,
  212: 		 get_callback_meta_field(since, cb_with_since_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  213: 
  214: cb_deprecated_tag(Config) ->
  215:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_meta),
  216:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  217:     ?assertEqual(<<"Deprecated callback.">>,
  218: 		 get_callback_meta_field(deprecated, cb_with_deprecated_tag, 0, Docs) ).
  219: 
  220: links(Config) ->
  221:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_links),
  222:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  223:     ?assertEqual({<<"seeerl">>, <<"eep48_links">>},
  224: 		 get_doc_link({function, module_link, 0}, Docs)),
  225:     ?assertEqual({<<"seeapp">>, <<"edoc:index">>},
  226: 		 get_doc_link({function, app_link, 0}, Docs)),
  227:     ?assertEqual({<<"seeerl">>, <<"edoc:edoc_doclet">>},
  228: 		 get_doc_link({function, app_module_link, 0}, Docs)),
  229:     ?assertEqual({<<"seemfa">>, <<"edoc:edoc#files/2">>},
  230: 		 get_doc_link({function, app_mfa_link, 0}, Docs)),
  231:     ?assertEqual({<<"seemfa">>, <<"eep48_SUITE#suite/0">>},
  232: 		 get_doc_link({function, external_function_link, 0}, Docs)),
  233:     ?assertEqual({<<"seemfa">>, <<"#f/0">>},
  234: 		 get_doc_link({function, local_function_link, 0}, Docs)),
  235:     ?assertEqual({<<"seetype">>, <<"#t/0">>},
  236: 		 get_doc_link({function, local_type_link, 0}, Docs)),
  237:     ?assertEqual({<<"seetype">>, <<"#t/0">>},
  238: 		 get_doc_link({function, local_type_link_macro, 0}, Docs)),
  239:     ?assertEqual({<<"seetype">>, <<"eep48_links#t/0">>},
  240: 		 get_doc_link({function, external_type_link, 0}, Docs)).
  241: 
  242: see_tags_grouped_together(Config) ->
  243:     Docs = get_chunk(Config, eep48_links),
  244:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  245:     ?assertEqual( <<"See also: equiv_target/1, fun_with_equiv_doc_and_see/1.\n">>,
  246: 		  ?io2b(string:find(shell_docs:render(eep48_links, ?FUNCTION_NAME, Docs),
  247: 				    "See also")) ).
  248: 
  249: equiv(Config) ->
  250:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_links),
  251:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  252:     ?assertMatch(<<"Equivalent to equiv_target(ok).">>,
  253: 		 get_flat_doc({function, fun_with_equiv_tag, 0}, Docs)),
  254:     ?assertMatch(<<"Equivalent to {<<\"arbitrary\">>, erlang, \"term\"}.">>,
  255: 		 get_flat_doc({function, fun_with_non_call_equiv_tag, 0}, Docs)).
  256: 
  257: f_sig_single_simple_clause(Config) ->
  258:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  259:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  260:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_simple_clause(Arg)">>],
  261: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  262: 
  263: f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec(Config) ->
  264:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  265:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  266:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_simple_clause_with_spec(Arg)">>],
  267: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  268: 
  269: f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses(Config) ->
  270:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  271:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  272:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses(C1A1,">>, <<"C1A2)">>],
  273: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs)).
  274: 
  275: f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec(Config) ->
  276:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  277:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  278:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_simple_clauses_with_spec(C1A1,">>, <<"C1A2)">>],
  279: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs)).
  280: 
  281: f_sig_single_record_clause(Config) ->
  282:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  283:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  284:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_record_clause(R)">>],
  285: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  286: 
  287: f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec(Config) ->
  288:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  289:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  290:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_single_record_clause_with_spec(R)">>],
  291: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  292: 
  293: f_sig_multiple_record_clauses(Config) ->
  294:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  295:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  296:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_record_clauses(R)">>],
  297: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  298: 
  299: f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec(Config) ->
  300:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_sigs),
  301:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  302:     ?assertEqual([<<"f_sig_multiple_record_clauses_with_spec(R)">>],
  303: 		 get_sig({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs)).
  304: 
  305: f_spec_type_without_name(Config) ->
  306:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  307:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  308:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_type_without_name(Arg :: atom()) -> ok.\n">>,
  309: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  310: 
  311: f_spec_types_mixed(Config) ->
  312:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  313:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  314:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_types_mixed(Arg1 :: my_type(), Arg2 :: tuple()) -> ok.\n">>,
  315: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  316: 
  317: f_spec_with_multiple_clauses(Config) ->
  318:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  319:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  320:     ct:pal("EDoc repeats the first clause's param names for all clauses. "
  321: 	   "The actual param names are `(A1, A2); (S, I)'.", []),
  322:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_with_multiple_clauses(A1 :: my_type(), A2 :: atom()) ->\n"
  323: 		    "                                      atoms;\n"
  324: 		    "                                  (A1 :: string(), A2 :: integer()) ->\n"
  325: 		    "                                      not_atoms.\n">>,
  326: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  327: 
  328: f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause(Config) ->
  329:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  330:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  331:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_with_multiple_clauses_one_fun_clause(A1 :: my_type(),\n"
  332: 		    "                                                  A2 :: atom()) ->\n"
  333: 		    "                                                     atoms;\n"
  334: 		    "                                                 (A1 :: string(),\n"
  335: 		    "                                                  A2 :: integer()) ->\n"
  336: 		    "                                                     not_atoms.\n">>,
  337: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  338: 
  339: f_spec_lhs_match_expr(Config) ->
  340:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  341:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  342:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_lhs_match_expr(Pattern :: any()) -> ok.\n">>,
  343: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  344: 
  345: f_spec_rhs_match_expr(Config) ->
  346:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  347:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  348:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_rhs_match_expr(Pattern :: any()) -> ok.\n">>,
  349: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  350: 
  351: f_spec_unnamed_pattern(Config) ->
  352:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  353:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  354:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_unnamed_pattern(_ :: any()) -> ok.\n">>,
  355: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 1}, Docs) ).
  356: 
  357: f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun(Config) ->
  358:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  359:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  360:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_single_clause_fun(A, T, S, I) -> ok\n"
  361: 		    "                                          when\n"
  362: 		    "                                              A :: my_type(),\n"
  363: 		    "                                              T :: tuple(),\n"
  364: 		    "                                              S :: string(),\n"
  365: 		    "                                              I :: integer().\n">>,
  366: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 4}, Docs) ).
  367: 
  368: f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun(Config) ->
  369:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  370:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  371:     ct:pal("TODO: This expectation is buggy: the actual param names are `(A1, A2, A3, A4)', "
  372: 	   "but EDoc infers them to be `(A1, A2, A3, I)'.", []),
  373:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_multiple_clause_fun(A1, A2, A3, I) -> ok\n"
  374: 		    "                                            when\n"
  375: 		    "                                                A1 :: my_type(),\n"
  376: 		    "                                                A2 :: tuple(),\n"
  377: 		    "                                                A3 :: string(),\n"
  378: 		    "                                                I :: integer();\n"
  379: 		    "                                        (A1, A2, A3, A) -> ok\n"
  380: 		    "                                            when\n"
  381: 		    "                                                A1 :: string(),\n"
  382: 		    "                                                A2 :: integer(),\n"
  383: 		    "                                                A3 :: list(),\n"
  384: 		    "                                                A :: atom().\n">>,
  385: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 4}, Docs) ).
  386: 
  387: f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom(Config) ->
  388:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  389:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  390:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_singleton_atom(I, a) -> ok when I :: integer().\n">>,
  391: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  392: 
  393: f_spec_bounded_singleton_int(Config) ->
  394:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  395:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  396:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_bounded_singleton_int(I, 1) -> ok when I :: integer().\n">>,
  397: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  398: 
  399: f_spec_rettype_constraint(Config) ->
  400:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  401:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  402:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_rettype_constraint() -> R when R :: atom().\n">>,
  403: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  404: 
  405: f_spec_indirect_constraint(Config) ->
  406:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  407:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  408:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_indirect_constraint(A, B) -> ok when B :: [A].\n">>,
  409: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  410: 
  411: f_spec_arg_type_in_retval(Config) ->
  412:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_specs),
  413:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  414:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_spec_arg_type_in_retval(A, B) -> [A] when B :: atom().\n">>,
  415: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 2}, Docs) ).
  416: 
  417: f_redundant_spec(Config) ->
  418:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  419:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  420:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_redundant_spec() -> atom().\n">>,
  421:                   get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  422:     ?assertMatch( <<"Function with a redundant spec.">>,
  423: 		  get_flat_doc({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  424: 
  425: f_only_attr(Config) ->
  426:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  427:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  428:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec f_only_attr() -> atom().\n">>,
  429:                   get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  430:     ?assertMatch( <<"Function with only a spec attribute.">>,
  431: 		  get_flat_doc({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  432: 
  433: f_only_tag(Config) ->
  434:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  435:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  436:     ?assertException(error, {badkey, signature},
  437: 		     get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  438:     ?assertMatch( <<"Function with only a spec tag.">>,
  439: 		  get_flat_doc({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  440: 
  441: f_prefixed_spec(Config) ->
  442:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  443:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  444:     ?assertEqual( <<"-spec eep48_redundant:f_prefixed_spec() -> any().\n">>,
  445: 		  get_pp_spec({function, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  446: 
  447: t_only_attr(Config) ->
  448:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  449:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  450:     ?assertEqual( <<"-type t_only_attr() :: any().\n">>,
  451: 		  get_pp_spec({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  452:     ?assertEqual( <<"Type t_only_attr defined with an attribute.">>,
  453: 		  get_flat_doc({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  454: 
  455: t_only_tag(Config) ->
  456:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  457:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  458:     ?assertException(error, {badkey, signature},
  459: 		     get_pp_spec({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  460:     ?assertEqual( <<"Type t_only_tag defined with a tag.">>,
  461: 		  get_flat_doc({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  462: 
  463: t_redundant(Config) ->
  464:     Docs = get_docs(Config, eep48_redundant),
  465:     %?debugVal(Docs, 1000),
  466:     ?assertEqual( <<"-type t_redundant() :: any().\n">>,
  467: 		  get_pp_spec({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ),
  468:     ?assertEqual( <<"Type t_redundant defined with an attribute, redundant with a tag.">>,
  469: 		  get_flat_doc({type, ?FUNCTION_NAME, 0}, Docs) ).
  470: 
  471: %%
  472: %% Helpers
  473: %%
  474: 
  475: get_chunk(Config, M) ->
  476:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  477:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  478:     {ok, Chunk} = get_doc_chunk(DataDir, PrivDir, M),
  479:     Chunk.
  480: 
  481: get_docs(Config, M) ->
  482:     Chunk = get_chunk(Config, M),
  483:     Chunk#docs_v1.docs.
  484: 
  485: get_function_meta_field(Field, F, A, Docs) ->
  486:     get_meta_field(Field, function, F, A, Docs).
  487: 
  488: get_type_meta_field(Field, T, A, Docs) ->
  489:     get_meta_field(Field, type, T, A, Docs).
  490: 
  491: get_callback_meta_field(Field, Cb, A, Docs) ->
  492:     get_meta_field(Field, callback, Cb, A, Docs).
  493: 
  494: get_meta_field(Field, Kind, Name, Arity, Docs) ->
  495:     Meta = get_metadata(lookup_entry(Kind, Name, Arity, Docs)),
  496:     maps:get(Field, Meta).
  497: 
  498: get_doc_chunk(DataDir, PrivDir, Mod) ->
  499:     TagsErl = filename:join([DataDir, atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".erl"]),
  500:     edoc:files([TagsErl], [{doclet, edoc_doclet_chunks},
  501: 			   {layout, edoc_layout_chunks},
  502: 			   {dir, PrivDir}]),
  503:     TagsChunk = filename:join([PrivDir, "chunks", atom_to_list(Mod) ++ ".chunk"]),
  504:     {ok, BChunk} = file:read_file(TagsChunk),
  505:     Chunk = binary_to_term(BChunk),
  506:     {ok, Chunk}.
  507: 
  508: lookup_entry(Kind, Function, Arity, Docs) ->
  509:     [Entry] = lists:filter(fun({{K, F, A},_Anno,_Sig,_Doc,_Meta})
  510: 				 when K =:= Kind andalso F =:= Function, A =:= Arity ->
  511: 				   true;
  512: 			      (_) ->
  513: 				   false
  514: 			   end, Docs),
  515:     Entry.
  516: 
  517: get_metadata({_, _, _, _, Metadata}) -> Metadata.
  518: 
  519: get_doc_link(KNA, Docs) ->
  520:     D = get_doc(KNA, Docs),
  521:     case lists:foldl(fun F({a, _, _} = E, Acc) ->
  522:                         [E | Acc];
  523:                     F({_E, _, Es}, Acc) when is_list(Es) ->
  524:                         lists:foldl(F, Acc, Es);
  525:                     F(_, Acc) ->
  526:                         Acc
  527:                 end, [], D) of
  528:         [{a, Attrs, _}] ->
  529:             <<"https://erlang.org/doc/link/", ShortRel/bytes>> = fetch(rel, Attrs),
  530:             {ShortRel, fetch(href, Attrs)};
  531:         _Else ->
  532:             ct:log("Could not find link in ~p",[D]),
  533:             ct:fail("Did not find link in docs")
  534:     end.
  535: 
  536: get_anno(Kind, Name, Arity, Docs) ->
  537:     {_, Anno, _, _, _} = lookup_entry(Kind, Name, Arity, Docs),
  538:     Anno.
  539: 
  540: fetch(K, List) ->
  541:     case lists:keyfind(K, 1, List) of
  542: 	false -> erlang:error({not_found, K, List});
  543: 	{K, V} -> V
  544:     end.
  545: 
  546: get_flat_doc(KNA, Docs) ->
  547:     flatten_doc(get_doc(KNA, Docs)).
  548: 
  549: get_sig({K, N, A}, Docs) ->
  550:     Entry = docs_v1_entry(lookup_entry(K, N, A, Docs)),
  551:     Entry#docs_v1_entry.signature.
  552: 
  553: get_pp_spec({K, N, A}, Docs) ->
  554:     [Spec] = get_meta_field(signature, K, N, A, Docs),
  555:     iolist_to_binary(erl_pp:attribute(Spec)).
  556: 
  557: flatten_doc(XML) ->
  558:     iolist_to_binary(lists:reverse(xmerl_lib:foldxml(fun flatten_xml/2, [], XML))).
  559: 
  560: flatten_xml(T, Acc) when is_binary(T) -> [T | Acc];
  561: flatten_xml({_, _, XML}, Acc) -> xmerl_lib:foldxml(fun flatten_xml/2, Acc, XML).
  562: 
  563: get_doc({K, N, A}, Docs) ->
  564:     Entry = docs_v1_entry(lookup_entry(K, N, A, Docs)),
  565:     maps:get(<<"en">>, Entry#docs_v1_entry.doc).
  566: 
  567: copy_application(_App, undefined) ->
  568:     ct:fail("~s: target dir undefined", [?FUNCTION_NAME]);
  569: copy_application(App, TargetDir) ->
  570:     DocDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "doc"]),
  571:     EbinDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "ebin"]),
  572:     IncludeDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "include"]),
  573:     SrcDir	= filename:join([TargetDir, App, "src"]),
  574:     ok = file:make_dir(filename:join([TargetDir, App])),
  575:     ok = file:make_dir(DocDir),
  576:     ok = file:make_dir(EbinDir),
  577:     ok = file:make_dir(IncludeDir),
  578:     ok = file:make_dir(SrcDir),
  579:     copy_app_dir(App, ebin, EbinDir),
  580:     copy_app_dir(App, include, IncludeDir),
  581:     copy_app_dir(App, src, SrcDir),
  582:     {ok, #{ebin => EbinDir, doc => DocDir, src => SrcDir}}.
  583: 
  584: copy_app_dir(App, Dir, TargetDir) ->
  585:     {ok, Files} = file:list_dir(code:lib_dir(App, Dir)),
  586:     lists:foreach(fun (F) ->
  587: 			  file:copy(filename:join(code:lib_dir(App, Dir), F),
  588: 				    filename:join(TargetDir, F))
  589: 		  end, Files).
  590: 
  591: docs_v1_entry({KNA, Anno, Sig, Doc, Meta}) ->
  592:     #docs_v1_entry{kind_name_arity = KNA,
  593: 		   anno = Anno,
  594: 		   signature = Sig,
  595: 		   doc = Doc,
  596: 		   metadata = Meta}.
